mangaName: Moto Saikyou no Kenshi wa, Isekai Mahou ni Akogareru
alternativeNames:
Ex Strongest Swordsman Long For Magic In Different World
In Past Life, He was the invincible swordsman. In this life, He longs for the magic of another world.
元最強の剣士は、異世界魔法に憧れる
author: Kouzuki Shin
genres: Action, Adventure, Comedy, Fantasy, Isekai, Romance
